overview: Cal Roper's a hustler, a drifter and guy with a mean streak and mean piece. And, from the first scene on, he treats his johns to the unexpected -- often costing them more than their dignity.  Join Bo Sommers, Devyn Foster, Matt Gunther and Cort Stevens in Jim Steel's look at lust on the road without commitment, without a care and without a phone call in the morning.  Are you mean enough? Are you man enough?
tagline: If you don't have one, get one.  Mean and we mean it.
title: Mean Streak
